languages.text: Судьба Чистоголосого Пророка, хранителя священного Горнила, была скорбна. Посетив семь миров и подарив им благость трансформации, он сгинул от руки кровожадных пиратов-друкари вместе со свитой и бесценной реликвией.

The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.
languages.original_text: Судьба Чистоголосого Пророка, хранителя священного Горнила, была скорбна. Посетив семь миров и подарив им благость трансформации, он сгинул от руки кровожадных пиратов-друкари вместе со свитой и бесценной реликвией.

traits.locale_text: The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

languages.text: 神圣熔炉的守护者，纯洁之声先知落得了悲惨的下场。他造访了七个世界，赐予这些世界转化的祝福。然而在这之后，他和他的随从全都死在了嗜血的黑暗灵族海盗手中，那些无价的遗物也就此失去了下落。
languages.original_text: The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

traits.locale_text: 神圣熔炉的守护者，纯洁之声先知落得了悲惨的下场。他造访了七个世界，赐予这些世界转化的祝福。然而在这之后，他和他的随从全都死在了嗜血的黑暗灵族海盗手中，那些无价的遗物也就此失去了下落。

languages.text: 聖なる坩堝のガーディアンである純声の預言者の運命は悲しいものだった。7つの惑星を訪れ、そこで変容の祝福を与えた後、彼は血に飢えたデュカーリの手にかかって供人達と、そして価値のつけられないほど高価な聖遺物とともに死んだ。
languages.original_text: The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

traits.locale_text: 聖なる坩堝のガーディアンである純声の預言者の運命は悲しいものだった。7つの惑星を訪れ、そこで変容の祝福を与えた後、彼は血に飢えたデュカーリの手にかかって供人達と、そして価値のつけられないほど高価な聖遺物とともに死んだ。

languages.text: Le prophète à la voix pure, gardien du Creuset sacré, connut un destin des plus tristes. Après avoir visité sept mondes auxquels il fit le don de la transformation, il périt aux mains de pirates drukharis sanguinaires, qui firent aussi disparaître son entourage et la relique inestimable.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

traits.locale_text: Le prophète à la voix pure, gardien du Creuset sacré, connut un destin des plus tristes. Après avoir visité sept mondes auxquels il fit le don de la transformation, il périt aux mains de pirates drukharis sanguinaires, qui firent aussi disparaître son entourage et la relique inestimable.

languages.text: El destino del profeta de voz pura, guardián del santo Crisol, acabó en tragedia. Tras visitar siete mundos y otorgarles la bendición de la transformación, murió a manos de piratas Drukhari sanguinarios junto a su séquito y la reliquia irremplazable.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

traits.locale_text: El destino del profeta de voz pura, guardián del santo Crisol, acabó en tragedia. Tras visitar siete mundos y otorgarles la bendición de la transformación, murió a manos de piratas Drukhari sanguinarios junto a su séquito y la reliquia irremplazable.

languages.text: Das Schicksal des Propheten mit der Reinen Stimme, Bewacher des heiligen Tiegels, war traurig. Nachdem er sieben Welten besucht und dort den Segen der Verwandlung gesprochen hatte, fiel er blutrünstigen Drukhari-Piraten zum Opfer, zusammen mit seinem Gefolge und dem unbezahlbaren Relikt.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

traits.locale_text: Das Schicksal des Propheten mit der Reinen Stimme, Bewacher des heiligen Tiegels, war traurig. Nachdem er sieben Welten besucht und dort den Segen der Verwandlung gesprochen hatte, fiel er blutrünstigen Drukhari-Piraten zum Opfer, zusammen mit seinem Gefolge und dem unbezahlbaren Relikt.

languages.text: Kutsal Pota'nın muhafızı olan Peygamber Durusöz'ün sonu hazin oldu. Yedi dünyayı ziyaret ettikten ve oralara dönüşüm kutsaması ihsan ettikten sonra, maiyetiyle ve sahip olduğu paha biçilmez yadigârla birlikte kana susamış Drukhari korsanlarının elinde can verdi.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Pure-Voiced Prophet, guardian of the hallowed Crucible, was a sad one. After visiting seven worlds and bestowing the blessing of transformation upon them, he perished at the hands of bloodthirsty Drukhari pirates along with his retinue and the priceless relic.

traits.locale_text: Temiz Sesli Peygamber'in, kutsal Pota'nın muhafızının sonu hüzünlü oldu. Yedi dünyayı ziyaret ettikten ve oralara dönüşüm kutsaması ihsan ettikten sonra, maiyetiyle ve sahip olduğu paha biçilmez yadigârla birlikte kana susamış Drukhari korsanlarının eline düştü ve can verdi.
